SIM card change lock screen notification
Mobile phone data backup - Your Lenovo SecurityIt

"SecurityIt backup for your mobile phone contacts and SMS, please see the attachment. Annex contains： 1：contacts.vcf There exist all your contacts. 2：smsbackup.txt There exist all your SMS content.
Instructions for use： The attachment can be downloaded directly double-click on the smsbackup.txt file to view the message content. To import contacts please put contacts.vcf to your mobile phone SD card, set the import button from the memory card in the contact function. "

Sending \"passcode#SD\" to your lost device will instantly lock the lost device. If the attempt on unlock fail more than 3 times, the front camera will automatically be opened, then takes photo and sends it to the emergency contact.
Sending \"passcode#SD\" to your lost device will instantly enable screen locking on the device to protect your private information
"Sending \"passcode#DW\" to your lost device will return your device's remote position"
Sending \"passcode#BJ\" to your lost device will immediately activate your devices alarm
Sending \"passcode#BF\" to your lost device will email a backup of SMS, contacts and other information if you have set up a backup email address
Sending \"passcode#XH\" to your lost device will immediately destroy any personal information to protect your privacy. There will be a backup attempt before destroying
How to find the lost device?
Please make sure the lost device has enabled the Anti-theft service
Recommend friends to install SecurityIt, jointly protect mobile phone
Secret answer wrong, please input again
The 2G/3G data consumed by updating Security will be charged by your carrier.
When SIM is changed, emergency contact will receive a message
When the device is lost, sending the backup data command will request your phone to transmit your data to the following email address
SecurityIt will inform the number with Anti-theft instructions

"Security instructions: once the other phone lost, can send cell phone Anti-theft remote instruction in order to reduce the loss of the other phone. Instruction: password # operation code.Mobile phone data backup code: BF, data destruction Code: XH, mobile phone lock code: SD, positioning and tracking code: DW, alarm code: BJ"
"Important settings manager protects the right of access to privacy. You probably shouldn't allow this permission."

" Click on the link below to view the map position information: "
SecurityIt has backup the photo of who attempted to crack the Anti-theft lock screen, please see the attachment.
SMS sent to inform the owner. Thank you!
[remind] Anti-theft Anti-theft function I was using Lenovo SecurityIt, if the SIM card is replaced, will give the phone to send text messages to inform you.
"[remind] someone trying to master the Anti-theft mobile phone unlocking machine, has captured photos:%1s "

If you force stop an app, it may cause errors.
If you disable an app, other apps may encounter errors.
If you disable an internal app, other apps may encounter errors. Your data will also be deleted.
This service was started by its app. Force stopping it may cause the app to crash.
"This app can't safely be stopped. If you stop it, you may lose some of your current work."
"This is an old app process that is still running in case it's needed again. There is usually no reason to stop it."

This setting affects all users on this phone.
If you stop these service, some features of your phone may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.

This permission allows an app to display on top of other apps you’re using and may interfere with your use of the interface in other applications, or change what you think you are seeing in other applications.

To ensure the accuracy of the interception,we will update the DB of marked numbers. This may consumes a small amount of your data traffic

Disabled by administrator, encryption policy, or credential storage
Password must be fewer than %d characters.
PIN must be fewer than %d digits.
Password must be at least %d characters
PIN must be at least %d digits
An ascending, descending or repeated sequence of digits is forbidden
"Device administrator doesn't allow using a recent PIN."
Password must contain at least one letter.
Password must contain at least one digit.
"Device administrator doesn't allow using a recent password."
"Original setting password will expire if you close the function. You need to reset the password when open the function once again. Are you sure you want to close it?"
To enable private mode feature, you will need to set a system password. Shall we continue this process?
System password can be used to view the hidden content and enter system settings.
Private password for visitors to visit the phone, and can not enter some system settings.
After closing this feature, the hidden material will no longer be hidden, are you sure you want to close this feature?

"Private mode can help you to hide pictures, videos, contacts and apps through different lock screen. Please do not set the private password the same as the system password. Private mode will be synchronized with the factory password lock screen function. After opening into private mode, hidden contact's SMS will not be shown on the lock screen and the hidden contact's calls will also serve as a stranger. Privacy mode does not support third party application for privacy protection and malicious privacy content to crack behavior is not within our scope of protection."
You can set and use fingerprint to enter private mode.
"Please set up at least 2 fingerprints Enable this function need verify your privacy fingerprint"
Please go to the system setting to add 2 fingerprint and then enable privacy fingerprint function
You have enable this privacy fingerprint function, privacy fingerprint will be as a visitor pattern, the rest of the fingerprint will be entered as a normal mode of the fingerprint

After being disabled, the app will not be able to connect to the data network
After being disabled, the app will not be able to connect to WLAN

After being enabled, all apps will be able to connect to the data network. Are you sure you want to enable?
After being disabled, no apps will be able to connect to WLAN. Are you sure you want to disable?
After being enabled, all apps will be able to connect to WLAN. Are you sure you want to enable?
